alert.note: Alert for Winona (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued October 24 at 6:43PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is occurring. * WHERE...A portion of southeast Minnesota, including the following county, Winona. * WHEN...Until 845 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Street flooding in the city of Winona. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 641 PM CDT, emergency management reported street flooding Winona due to heavy rain. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Winona, Goodview and Lock And Dam 5 A. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
